Name: Rusty Lockbox
Description: A simple iron box with a corroded tumbler.

Name: Merchant Safe
Description: Reinforced steel with a hidden needle trap.

Name: Vault Door
Description: The heavy mechanical seal of a pre-collapse bank.

Name: Nailed Crate
Description: Wooden slats nailed shut. Requires prying or smashing.

Name: Iron Footlocker
Description: Heavy lid that requires raw power to force open.

Name: Barred Gate
Description: A thick metal gate held by a heavy internal bar.

Name: Junk Terminal
Description: A flickering screen controlling a small stash.

Name: Security Console
Description: Wires are exposed; failure causes an electric shock.

Name: Mainframe Hub
Description: The central logic core. Failure causes neural feedback.

Name: Engraved Urn
Description: A clay vessel covered in protective Void runes.

Name: Shadow Coffin
Description: A stone sarcophagus that drains light from the room.

Name: Void Pillar
Description: A floating monolith pulsing with forbidden energy.

Name: Loose Rubble
Description: A pile of debris that might hide something useful.

Name: Hidden Cache
Description: Cleverly hidden under floorboards with a tripwire.
